name: position.js
description: Positions a popup element to an anchor element.

scripts.build:commonjs: rm -rf ./lib && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:es: rm -rf ./es && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.build:examples: cd examples && PUBLIC_URL=/position.js/ npm run build
scripts.prepublish: npm run eslint && npm test && npm run build
